text: Unibuke ubwo Nyagasani wawe yazanaga (roho zose za) bene Adamu n’iz’urubyaro ruzaturuka mu migongo yabo, maze akazihuriza hamwe akazibwira agira ati “Ese si njye Nyagasani wanyu? Bakavuga bati “Ni byo, turahamya ko uri Nyagasani wacu.” (Allah aravuga ati: “ibi mbikoze) kugira ngo ku munsi w’imperuka mutazavuga muti “Mu by’ukuri ibi ntitwabimenye.”
